text: Mala Ram Gangwal (born 14 August 1949), is an Indian politician, belonging to Indian National Congress. He is member of the legislative assembly representing Madipur constituency, a seat he has won three times. == Post held == {| class="wikitable" |+Political title !Year !Post !Constituency |- |1998 |Member of Legislative Assembly |Madipur Constituency |- |2003 |Member of Legislative Assembly |Madipur Constituency |- |2008 |Member of Legislative Assembly |Madipur Constituency |- |} ==References== Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Delhi Category:1949 births Category:Living people
title: Mala Ram Gangwal
